meta.description: Specialized cat sanctuary and rescue website template

site.name: Whiskers Haven Cat Sanctuary
site.title: Whiskers Haven - A Safe Place for Every Cat
site.description: Dedicated cat sanctuary providing lifetime care for special needs cats and finding homes for adoptable felines in Colorado.

hero.title: Where Special Cats Find Forever Care
hero.text: Whiskers Haven is more than a rescue - we're a sanctuary providing lifetime care for special needs cats while finding loving homes for our adoptable felines. Every cat deserves love, regardless of age, health, or background.

backgroundImage.alt: Peaceful cat sanctuary with cats relaxing

service1.title: Cat Adoption
service1.description: Find your perfect feline companion from our socialized and health-checked cats ready for homes.

service2.title: Sanctuary Care
service2.description: Lifetime care for special needs, elderly, and unadoptable cats in our peaceful sanctuary setting.

service3.title: TNR Program
service3.description: Trap-Neuter-Return services to help control feral cat populations humanely and effectively.

about.title: A Haven for Cats Since 2008
about.text1: Whiskers Haven began as a small foster home and has grown into a 10-acre sanctuary caring for over 200 cats. We specialize in caring for senior cats, those with medical needs, and feral cats who cannot be socialized for adoption.
about.text2: Our sanctuary model ensures that no cat is ever euthanized for space, age, or medical condition. We provide individualized care, comfortable living spaces, and lots of love for every cat that comes through our doors.
about.quote: Whiskers Haven gave my senior cat Mittens the most beautiful final years. Their compassionate care meant everything to our family.

seoSection.title: Expert Medical Care & Behavioral Support
seoSection.text1: Our on-site veterinary clinic provides comprehensive medical care including surgery, dental work, and ongoing treatment for chronic conditions. We work with specialists to ensure every cat receives the best possible care.
seoSection.text2: Our experienced team includes certified cat behaviorists who help fearful and traumatized cats learn to trust again. Through patience and specialized techniques, many of our sanctuary cats become adoptable family pets.

gallery.title: Happy Cats in Their Forever Home

reviews.title: Stories from Our Cat Family
reviews.text: Our sanctuary family includes adopters, volunteers, donors, and supporters who help us provide the best life possible for every cat in our care.

review1.text: Adopting Shadow from Whiskers Haven was the best decision we ever made. The staff knew him so well and helped us understand his needs perfectly. He's thriving in our home!
review1.name: Amanda & Tom Wilson
review1.title: Shadow's Family

review2.text: Volunteering at Whiskers Haven has been incredibly fulfilling. Seeing the transformation of scared cats into confident, loving companions reminds me why this work matters so much.
review2.name: Maria Santos
review2.title: Volunteer Coordinator

footer.text: Whiskers Haven Cat Sanctuary - Where Every Cat Matters

adopt.title: Cat Adoption Application

foster.title: Foster Home Application
foster.description: Provide temporary care for cats recovering from medical procedures or awaiting adoption.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Application
volunteer.description: Join our team caring for cats, helping with events, or supporting our administrative needs.

donation.title: Support Our Sanctuary Cats
donation.description: Your donation helps us provide lifetime care for special needs cats and find homes for adoptable felines.
